dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, this report here says... ten thousand casualties? Nationwide? What, uh, what is this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, this report here says... ten thousand casualties? Nationwide? What, uh, what is this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I know, right? It's intense. I mean, Washington, D.C., became a literal war zone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I know, right? It's intense. I mean, Washington, D.C., became a literal war zone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Open warfare," it says. Molotovs at the White House? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Open warfare, it says. Molotovs at the White House? Come on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, seriously, though. Power grids disabled. Federal agents, uh, using live ammunition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, seriously, though. Power grids disabled. Federal agents, uh, using live ammunition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Washington, D.C. saw the lights illuminating the White House go out sometime around 11 p.m. EST, as protesters set off fireworks nearby, with police responding by firing tear gas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. And, um, the Lincoln Memorial? Completely destroyed by explosives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. And, um, the Lincoln Memorial? Completely destroyed by explosives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sites around the National Mall were marked with graffiti, including the Lincoln Memorial, following Saturdays protests.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And martial law declared in all fifty states. Like, that's not, you know, normal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And martial law declared in all fifty states. Like, that's not, you know, normal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ABC News reported that the National Guard has been activated in 21 states plus Washington, D.C.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Martial law. Right. And, uh, George Floyd was a crisis actor?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Martial law. Right. And, uh, George Floyd was a crisis actor?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The death of George Floyd sparked nationwide outrage, coming amid the coronavirus pandemic and mass unemployment. Frustrations with police brutality towards black people boiled over after a video of a white Minneapolis police officer kneeling on Floyds neck⁠with three other officers standing by⁠went viral.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Look, that's the "deep state actors" part, whatever. But the actual events...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Look, that's the deep state actors part, whatever. But the actual events...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The "actual events" include rioters with automatic weapons raiding military supply depots. Sounds... plausible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The actual events include rioters with automatic weapons raiding military supply depots. Sounds... plausible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They say the 82nd Airborne got deployed. That's, like, a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They say the eighty second Airborne got deployed. That's, like, a big deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Is it? Or is it just another... you know. This whole "planned revolution" thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Is it? Or is it just another... you know. This whole planned revolution thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the fires, though. The Supreme Court. The National Archives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the fires, though. The Supreme Court. The National Archives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is dramatic! People are dying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is dramatic! People are dying.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Allegedly. I mean, "unconfirmed report circulating within the Pentagon."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Allegedly. I mean, unconfirmed report circulating within the Pentagon.

dialogue_turns.text: Still, though. It's, um, it's pretty wild.
